pullrequest.title: Fixed bug with timing in labscript

content.raw:
Actually I just took another look at it and I was wrong since all_change_times is now the same as all_change_times_numpy after line 538. So my mistake, sorry.
But line 539 is kind of useless as the numpy to set to list conversion has already been done. We should remove it anyway as we have spotted it now and might forget later on.
content.html: Actually I just took another look at it and I was wrong since all_change_times is now the same as all_change_times_numpy after line 538. So my mistake, sorry. But line 539 is kind of useless as the numpy to set to list conversion has already been done. We should remove it anyway as we have spotted it now and might forget later on.
